attributes.action: We demand the Government continue their No Outsider Scheme within all schools.
attributes.background: There have been several protest in Birmingham towards the No Outsider Scheme and it has resulted in schools in halting said programme. We demand the Government continue the programme and if possible extend this scheme to the parents for better societal cohesion. Otherwise homophobia will fester.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the No Outsider Scheme isn't a Government scheme. It's a decision for individual schools whether they wish to adopt the programme, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.

You can find out more about what the Government is proposing around Relationships and Sex Education here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/social-policy/education/relationships-and-sex-education-in-schools-whats-changing/
